features: The table is built to last. With the legs and support frame made of powder coated steel, and the table top made of high-density polyethylene, this table is built to last and handle a heavy load.
MULTI-PURPOSE UTILITY TABLE: Versatile use makes it perfect as a dining or game table for outdoor cookouts or birthday parties, or as a serving or display table for indoor events.
PORTABLE & EASY STORAGE: Innovative gravity auto-locking design with double gravity auto-lock to fold/unfold this table in seconds and make it small and compact and store it anywhere!
It is extremely light and easy to carry, to take with you anywhere and everywhere. This table comes ready to use right out of the box, no assembly required.
body.description: HEAVY-DUTY TABLE TOP: Place food, drinks, and much more on the strong, easy-to-clean table top with high-quality plastic up to 17% thicker than other brands, plus 3x the weight capacity at 300 lbs. INDOOR/OUTDOOR USE: Versatile use makes it perfect as a dining or game table for outdoor cookouts or birthday parties, or as a serving or display table for indoor events STURDY SUPPORT: Powder-coated steel legs, frame joint locks, and non-slip plastic feet help to keep the table in place during every event PORTABLE: Foldable design includes a side lock and handle, making it easy to take on the go or store away in a compact space when not in use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Multi-use Table!
reviews.reviewText: I looked at a million tables, and read a million reviews as I always do. This fit the bill in EVERY WAY! I just set it up and know it’s what I needed for sure. I purchased initially for one main thing,…. I needed a place to craft. I usually do it in the kitchen which turns into a tiring thing because I have to gather all of my craft supplies back and forth and then the clean up is exhausting. Now I can work directly where I keep my supplies and contain my mess making life much easier!!! Yes please haha! Also, this table has like 5 levels of height! Perfect again for my little 2 yr old granddaughter to play, eat, craft and anything she wants to do when visiting and it’ll grow with her! Great for Holidays, when extra room is needed, great for a ‘wrapping station’ for Christmas gifts,…….and I LOVE that its foldable! I can literally it stash behind a door, under a bed, closet,….. I’m so happy I took a chance ordering this!!!! It’s going to be awesome and it’s very sturdy and will be easy to clean as well. A wonderful buy at a good price, for all it will do!! I almost bought the 6 ft table but so glad I went with the 4 ft. which is perfect in the guest/craft room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Size 19"D x 34"W x 24"H? NOPE!
reviews.reviewText: I really like the table. It came folded in half in nice box and easy to carry inside. From unboxing to set up took me less than one minute. Just pull the folded halves apart (yes, it takes quite some force so go for it!), lay table flat on floor top down, slide the legs out and they click into place. Boom! Next, to adjust leg height, use a hand for each peg and push hard and slide upwards to desired height. Yes, it helps to stand on lightly on crossbrace or have 2nd person but I did this alone in that 1 minute setup.Confusion for me for a few seconds trying to figure how to “lock” the middle sections cause my other brand tables have a slide lock. This doesn’t. You simply turn table over and it locks in place. There are 2 yellow buttons to push on underneath front and back to unlock it.The unhappy part was that I was looking for table 19-20” in depth and the product description says Size 19"D x 34"W x 24"H.Well, it’s actually 24” D x 48” W (L) X whatever adjustible height settings.This is not a deal-breaker cause it’s a really nice, almost level table. I’m sure to love the size. But, I didn’t account for those extra inches and now need to rearrange everything around it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Little kids craft and homeschool table
reviews.reviewText: Perfect height for kids chairs to sit at and do crafting or handwriting activities. I love that it's durable and easy to clean. I don't fold it up often because we have it in a dedicated space, but I anticipate using it in the future as an extra camping table or for holiday dinners or [etc]... It's such a wonderfully useful bit of indestructible plastic and metal. I like things that last a long time and have multiple uses, and this checks both of those boxes for sure.

reviews.reviewText: Instead of those crazy metal pieces that you used to slide underneath to secure these lock and you press a lever which is so much more safe than the old kind. It’s study and great. I think you’ll like it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing! Super Versatile, Adjustable & Great for the Price!
reviews.reviewText: This desk holds two 24” monitors, an entire full keyboard mouse set, binders with room to write, and coffee of course. I would have loved to use this as a make shift kitchen table for my apartment, but I had to work from home so this is what I am using it for.Takes 2 seconds to put together, easy to adjust legs for height (for use as an office set up or a kitchen table) and is study to hold what I need it to. Only problem is the top is a tad hard to clean with the not as smooth surface, and you definitely need something over top of a piece of paper if you plan on using this as a desk for writing. I would also really love this as a makeup/hair desk. Planning on buying more, especially with the great price!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Keeps stored basement items off cement floor.

We use this in our compact condo for everything from dining in front of the TV to sitting and working to standup computer work. Easy to adjust for height, with good options. Light to carry from place to place, and folds easily for storage behind a sofa. Recommended
Table seems very sturdy and is better quality then I expected
Light weight and sturdy. Just the right height for crafts or using as an extra table.
The table was damaged upon arrival. A ugly hole at its center. I cannot keep a table like that in my place.
